content: Nevada Gov. to Veto Domestic Partner Bill Nevada governor Jim Gibbons has pledged to veto a bill passed by the legislature on Tuesday that would give same-sex domestic partners many of the same rights as married heterosexual couples. Gibbons, a Republican, has up to five days to veto the bill. Both houses of the legislature are expected to override the veto. More at >>>http://www.advocate.com/news_detail_ektid84851.asp

title: Nevada Gov. to Veto DP Bill
